alert.note: Alert for Kennebec; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 7:41AM EST until December 21 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Moderate to Major severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Kennebec and Sagadahoc Counties. Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Somerset and Kennebec Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at Hallowell. * WHEN...Until Thursday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:24 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 17.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 22.6 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
